GlyphInteractionDuration.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

GlyphDetectionRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph can be seen

GlyphInteractionDurationKiller.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

BlueGlyphInteractionDuration.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

BlueGlyphDetectionRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph can be seen

BlueGlyphStatusEffectDuration.Description: Duration of the status effect applied by the blue glyph

YellowGlyphInteractionDuration.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

YellowGlyphDetectionRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph can be seen

PurpleGlyphInteractionDuration.Description: Duration of the interaction to activate the glyph

PurpleGlyphDetectionRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph can be seen

PurpleGlyphMovementRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph stops moving when approached by killer

PurpleGlyphRedirectRange.Description: Range in which the Glyph chooses a new location when approched by killer

PurpleGlyphAuraRevealDuration.Description: Duration of aura reveal when survivor is hooked

PurpleGlyphNewLocationDistanceMinimum.Description: The closest a Purple Glyph can be to its next selected location

PurpleGlyphNewLocationDistanceMaximum.Description: The farthest a Purple Glyph can be to its next selected location

PurpleGlyphMovementAcceptanceRadius.Description: Acceptance radius for the Purple Glyph when it moves to a new location
